message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value product. I believe you'll find it to be a great addition to your collection. My initial offer is $11000.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $8500. I can meet you halfway, though. My counteroffer is $9500.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $9000. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. My counteroffer is $9500, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal, such as a free maintenance package. Can you consider that?
I appreciate the extras, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, and I'll consider the maintenance package a nice bonus. Can you meet me at $9000?
